who-we-are.title: Who We Are
who-we-are.description: Discover a leading project management and consulting company dedicated to creating transformative educational experiences. We focus on organizing and delivering a variety of educational projects.

our-focus.title: Our Focus
our-focus.description: Organizing and Delivering a Variety of Educational Projects. Our main goal is to help people gain meaningful life experiences abroad that will help them grow, both professionally and personally.

our-beliefs.title: Our Beliefs
our-beliefs.description: At *** We believe that having an experience abroad is a great opportunity to open your mind, explore different cultures and speak other languages. Thanks to globalization, we live in a connected world that offers many opportunities to travel and explore outside of our home country.

coming-challenges.title: Overcoming Challenges
coming-challenges.description:
Leaving your comfort zone and going abroad can be stressful and challenging.

This is why at *** We want to make your experience abroad easier. We support your project by making all the necessary arrangements.

home-page.help-you: We Are Looking Forward To Helping You Enjoy Your Educational Adventure

services-page.title: Our Services
services-page.message:
Select & discover from our services to learn

more about them.

other-services.title: Other services
other-services.description:
Select & discover from our services to learn
more about them.

work-experience.title: Work Experience
work-experience.description: Erasmus+ can help you gain valuable work experience abroad. By participating in the Erasmus+ traineeship program you will improve your interpersonal and foreign language skills, and you will develop intercultural skills that will help you find a job after your studies. Erasmus+ supports work placements or study periods abroad for students currently enrolled in vocational education and training (VET) and for recent graduates.
work-experience.message:
At *** We offer a variety of professional sectors in which you can do your internship experience. We know how important it is to gain some professional work experience that is why we offer high quality internships tailored to every individual.



We have a team of experts that will review and study your CV and motivational letter to match you with the right company. You will get support through the interviewing process, you will get a supervisor assigned to you to monitor your performance and make sure you achieve the best results.



We will provide you with the learning agreement and all the help you need before and during your internship.

we-offer.title: Find out what professional sector we offer

IT.title: IT and Multimedia Professions
IT.description:
IT - Information technology (IT) is the use of any computers, storage, networking and other physical devices, infrastructure and processes to create, process, store, secure and exchange all forms of electronic data.
Multimedia is a growing field that is part of the technology sector and includes professional opportunities as graphic design, marketing, product development, multimedia designer etc.

business.title: Business Administration
business.description: Business administration is a broad field that includes many different roles, professional settings and opportunities for growth. In simple terms, business administration is the work of managing an organization's resources, time and people. This professional sector includes professional opportunities such as working in the sales, finance or administrative department.

tourism.title: Tourism & Hospitality Industry
tourism.description: The Tourism and Hospitality industry is a broad industry that includes many sectors, including hotels, restaurants, travel agencies, theme parks, museums, etc. Tourism and hospitality are rewarding industries with growing job opportunities. An internship in this field will allow the apprentice to improve customer service and communication skills, practice a foreign language and learn new techniques.

beauty.title: Beauty Professions
beauty.description: This sector includes various professions related to aesthetics, hairdressing, cosmetics and nails. This professional sector includes opportunities such as working in a beauty salon, hair salon, nail salon, spa center, cosmetics store etc. An internship in this field will allow the apprentice to discover new techniques in a foreign language.

job-shadowing.title: Job Shadowing
job-shadowing.description:
Job shadowing programmes offer participants the chance to spend a period of time at a hosting organization in another country. The aim of this program is to learn new practices and gather new ideas through observation and interaction with peers, experts or other practitioners in their daily work at the hosting organization.
Eligible participants include teachers, trainers, and all other non-teaching experts and staff in adult education.
Eligible non-teaching staff includes staff working in adult education, either in adult education providers or in other organizations active in adult education.
job-shadowing.message:
At *** We collaborate with a large number of hosting job shadowing schools that have been carefully selected, these schools include primary, secondary and high schools. Additionally we collaborate with technical and vocational schools and schools with special needs. 
The topics of the job shadowing can include, inclusion, diversity, digitization in schools, teaching sustainability, promoting STEM. 
By the end of the job shadowing programme participants get exposed to several teaching practices focused on the chosen topics. 
They acquire new teaching techniques, and discover resources that they can apply to their teaching practices.
At *** We also provide the sending organizations with the necessary learning agreement.

school-exchange.title: School Exchange
school-exchange.description: Youth exchanges allow groups of young people from different countries to meet, live together and work on shared projects for short periods. Youth exchanges take place outside the school environment. On a youth exchange, you can expect to participate in activities such as workshops, exercises, debates, role-plays, outdoor activities and more.
school-exchange.message:
At *** We collaborate with a large number of hosting schools for school exchange that have been carefully selected, these schools include primary, secondary and high schools. School Exchange is a great opportunity for the foreign students to do a wide range of activities that include country presentations, cultural workshops or language sessions with local students.
At *** We also provide logistic and local support through the school exchange program.

erasmus-mundus.title: Erasmus Mundus
erasmus-mundus.description: This action aims at fostering excellence and worldwide internationalization of higher education institutions via study programmes – at Master course level – jointly delivered and jointly recognised by higher education institutions (HEIs) established in Europe, and open to institutions in other countries of the world.
erasmus-mundus.message: We know the challenges of finding a new home abroad as an international students, at *** We help international students to find accommodation that meets your expectations and it is suitable with your budget. We assist international students with questions, general advice. We provide support and useful information to international students by organizing Pre-Departure Orientation seminars.

KA-2.title: KA2 - We look for partners
KA-2.description: KA2 action projects are a combination of decentralized projects run by the National Agencies and centralised activities managed by the European Commission’s Executive Agency.

eligible.title: Who is eligible to apply?
eligible.description:
• Educational Institutions
  • Local Authorities
  • Non Profit Organisations
  • Small and Medium Enterprises (SMEs)
  • State-owned Enterprises

language-courses.title: Language Courses & AI Trainings
language-courses.description: At *** You can learn English or Spanish with our qualified native teachers. Engaging and dynamic lessons will make you feel comfortable from the beginning. Learn and improve your language skills while having fun.

english-courses.title: English courses
english-courses.description:
Have you spent years learning English at school but still lack fluency and confidence to speak English?



Then this is the right course for you.

focus.title:
During this course our English teachers will

focus on:
focus.description:
• Identify your spoken difficulties and pronunciation challenges.
  • Eliminate any grammatical or pronunciation mistakes.
  • Giving you topics to practice conversation.
  • Expanding your vocabulary, teaching you common phrases.

help.title: This course will help you:
help.description:
• Improve your fluency speaking English
  • Increase your confidence in speaking English.
  • Improve your pronunciation and accent.
  • Expand your vocabulary in English.

details.title: Details:
details.description:
• Flexible schedule morning, afternoon, evening, weekend courses.
  • Group size max 10 students per class
  • Duration from 1 to 20 weeks.
  • Price:

business-english-courses.description:

Then this is the right course for you.

focus.title:
During this course our English teachers will
focus on:
focus.description:
• Eliminate any grammatical or pronunciation mistakes.
  • Giving you real life scenarios at the workplace to practice conversation.
  • Expanding your business vocabulary.
  • Writing business reports and memos.

help.title: This course will help you:
help.description:
• Improve your fluency in speaking English at the workplace.
  • Increase your confidence in speaking English at the workplace.
  • Improve your pronunciation and accent.
  • Expand your business related vocabulary in English.

details.title: Details:
details.description:
• Flexible schedule morning, afternoon, evening, weekend courses.
  • Group size max 10 students per class
  • Duration from 1 to 20 weeks.
  • Price:

ai-trainings.title: AI Trainings
ai-trainings.description:
Artificial Intelligence (AI) can be denied as the intelligence of machines or software. It is a field of study in computer science which develops and studies intelligent machines.

AI is changing nearly every industry and will have a massive impact in the labor market and society in the upcoming years.

immersion-program.title: Immersion program
immersion-program.description: An immersion program is a great opportunity for students to explore a different culture and practice a new language with native speakers. During the immersion program learners will live fully immersed in a new culture, they will live with a host family that will teach them more about their country and their traditions.

exchange-program.title: Student exchange program
exchange-program.description: A Student Exchange Program is a great opportunity to study abroad,discover a new culture and practice a new language. Participating in a Student Exchange Program is an important step in your education that can change your life. This experience will make you grow, and will help you gain skills that you will use later in life.

concierge.title: Student concierge services
concierge.description:
Studying abroad is an exciting experience but can be a worrying journey for many international students. The participants as well as their families are often concerned and a bit stressed about the uncertainty of the new experience abroad.
Our commitment is to help students and their families to get familiar with the new country and its customs. We offer 24/7 emergency support to our students.

about-us-page.title: About us
about-us-page.description:
I found this company inspired by the many experiences I had abroad and how they opened my mind and enriched my life. My first experience abroad was under the Eramus program. During my University studies I had the opportunity to be an Erasmus student at the Faculty of Law at La Sapienza University in Rome, it was a wonderful year that definitely changed the direction of my life. A couple of years after that I decided that I wanted to explore another country outside of Europe so I decided to do an exchange program in the United States, and again it was an unforgettable experience for me. I became an Au Pair and lived with a host family for a year and a half in New York, this allowed me to gain practical knowledge of the educational system in the United States, it also allowed me to meet people from all round the world.



My goal is to encourage students to get out of their comfort zone and to help people having memorable life experiences abroad while at the same time contributing to improving education and understanding across cultures.
about-us-page.quote:
There is no passion to be found playing small -

In settling for a life that is less

than the one you are capable of living

destinations-page.title: Popular destinations
destinations-page.message: Select & discover more our popular destinations to know more about them.

inspired.title: Feeling inspired?
inspired.description:
Discover Endless Possibilities:



Your Gateway to Unforgettable Experiences and Connections

prague.title: Prague
prague.reason: There are numerous reasons to have your experience abroad in the Capital of the Czech Republic, some of them include: affordable housing, reliable and cheap public transportation, a city full of expats and international students with opportunities to meet people from different countries.

madrid.title: Madrid
madrid.reason: There are several reasons to have your experience abroad in the Capital of Spain, some of them include : affordable housing, extensive public transport, living in a multicultural and vibrant city with plenty of things to do, great nightlife full of options, nice weather, delicious food. Madrid has some of the best universities in Spain.

malaga.title: Málaga
malaga.reason: There are different reasons to have your experience abroad in Malaga, some of them include : affordable housing, cheap public transport, delicious food, nice weather during most of the year, which together with the open and cheerful character of the locals, creates a city with a lot of atmosphere. The streets are always full of people gathering together. Malaga has a vibrant nightlife and a rich history.

krakow.title: Krakow
krakow.reason: There are several reasons to choose Krakow for your experience abroad. It is a very affordable and safe city with a historical university and beautiful architecture, UNESCO designated its old town area a World Heritage site in 1978. This city is full of international students so you will have the opportunity to have a multicultural experience.

dublin.title: Dublin
dublin.reason: There are different reasons to choose the capital or Ireland for your experience abroad, it is a welcoming and vibrant city, full of museums, galleries, bars and restaurants. Dublin is one of 6 UNESCO cities of literature.

ghent.title: Ghent
ghent.reason: There are different reasons to choose Ghent to have your experience abroad, it is a multicultural city with an international student community. It has one of the most prestigious universities in Europe. It is an affordable city with good public transport and a bicycle-friendly city. It is one of the Belgian cities with the most historical and cultural buildings.

accommodations-page.title: Accommodations
accommodations-page.description: What is the best accommodation option for my experience abroad? Choosing the type of housing for your experience abroad can be a challenging decision, here we give you useful information and tips to help you pick the right accommodation for you.

apartment.title: Apartment
apartment.description: Choosing an apartment is usually one of the best options for a long term experience abroad, you will have a place to call home in a fully equipped apartment, at the same time you will have the opportunity to live with students from other nationalities and learn about their cultures. It is a great option to have your own space and at the same time share some space and time with your flat mates in the common area.

student-residence.title: Student Residence
student-residence.description: Choosing a student residence is a suitable option for short and long term experience abroad, some students prefer this option only for short term mobility because after some time they miss the freedom of living in an apartment. One of the benefits of living in a student residence is that you will get to meet a lot of students from different countries, you have a 24 hour reception desk and common amenities that will give you a sense of community. Some campuses have sports facilities which are convenient for some students.

host-family.title: Host Family
host-family.description: Choosing to live with a host family is an unique opportunity to immerse yourself in the local culture. A host family can provide a welcoming and supportive environment, therefore you will have a sense of family, your hosts will help you when you have problems or are feeling homesick, you will create a special bond that can last for a lifetime. You will still have your own space if you choose to have a private room, host families are a great option for both short and long term experience abroad.

hotel.title: Hotel
hotel.description: Choosing to stay in a hotel is a great option for short term experience abroad. You will have the comfort of having cleaning services everyday, 24 hours reception desk, and an optional cooking service. This option is more expensive therefore is best for short periods.

hostel.title: Hostel
hostel.description: Choosing to stay in a hostel is a great option for short term experience abroad. It is a cheaper option than a hotel and still has the services of a 24 hours reception desk and access to all essential amenities. It is great to meet new people and have a social environment.

airbnb.title: Airbnb
airbnb.description: Choosing to stay in an Airbnb is a great option for short and long term experience abroad. It is generally cheaper than a hotel and it has the advantage of having an equipped kitchen where you can cook your own meals and use the laundry. On the other hand, Airbnb is missing a 24 hours reception desk.

contact-page.title: Contact
contact-page.message: The simplest way to commence is by initiating contact.

standards.title: Highest quality standards
standards.description: We work hard to provide the highest quality in every project we deliver. We firmly believe that delivering high quality services will lead to customer satisfaction.

team.title: Dedicated team
team.description: Our team will always make sure to fully understand your needs, exceed your expectations and ensure the best results in your project.

approach.title: Customized approach
approach.description: Not every project is the same and we know it, at *** you will receive A fully customized approach. We work hard for your to/so you can enjoy the results

more-info.title: Looking For More</br>Information?
more-info.questions: We are here to answer all your questions. </br></br> Contact us today!

become-partner.title: Become A Partner
become-partner.description:
We are here to answer all your questions.



Contact us today!

what-is-erasmus-plus.title: What is Erasmus+?
what-is-erasmus-plus.description: Erasmus+ is the EU's programme to support education, training, youth and sport in Europe. This program offers mobility opportunities in European Union countries and partner countries, allowing you to have a unique experience abroad.

how-to-erasmus-plus.title: How to establish an Erasmus+ mobility project with a partner mobility agency?
how-to-erasmus-plus.description: Contact us now to discover more about our services, the host companies and schools we collaborate with and how we can help you achieve your Erasmus+ mobility project. You can request your free quote on our website.

how-to-organize.title: What steps do I need to take to organize an Erasmus+ mobility with a partner mobility agency?
how-to-organize.description: The first step is to contact us, we will evaluate your Erasmus+ mobility project with a customized approach to meet your needs and expectations. Our team of mobility experts will support you throughout the entire process.

why-erasmus-plus.title: Why contact a partner mobility agency to organize my Erasmus+ mobility?
why-erasmus-plus.description: *** guarantees a successful Erasmus+ mobility project in various professional sectors and destinations. We collaborate with a variety of companies, schools, institutions and accommodation services that have been carefully selected to provide you with a high quality Erasmus+ experience. Additionally, we arrange transportation, cultural activities and we provide local support and tutoring services to ensure the participants are feeling supported.

language-courses-offer.title: What kind of language courses do we offer?
language-courses-offer.description: We offer a variety of personalized language courses. We assess your language level and put you at the correct level from the start to ensure that your language skills will improve. We work with a team of passionate native teachers that will make sure you will get the best results.

what-it-is.title: What is a student exchange program?
what-it-is.description: A student exchange program is a program in which students from a secondary school or higher education study abroad at one of their institution's partner institutions. These programs involve the student attending classes at a foreign institution, living with a local family in some cases, and taking part in activities that are unique to the culture of the foreign country.

what-included.title: What is included in concierge services for students?
what-included.description: Student Concierge Services provides personalized support services for international students studying in a foreign country. Our aim is to provide the student with the best and most comfortable living abroad experience. We know letting your child go abroad to study in a foreign country can be stressful, to ease this process we stay connected with the student.
